name: Stack of Forces
description:
My and my wife's (keysha3 on itch) prototype intended for TeenyTiny DragonRuby MiniGameJam 2021. Unfortunately, we couldn't deliver everything we'd planned but it's playable.

The general purpose of this prototype was to explore and develop some of the mechanics for a bigger game project that we've been mulling for a while.

Rules: Just place correct cards into appropriate slots. Look out for random impediments.
